thread.section_title: Firmoo Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Firmoo | www.firmoo.com | 2 of 13
thread.title: Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text:
Before ordering my glasses I sent an email to Firmoo requesting additional information, which was answered promptly, I then went ahead and ordered two pairs of glasses as part of the buy one get one free offer. The customer service is attentive - as my glasses were being made I received emails keeping me informed of the order progress. My glasses arrived in a timely fashion and they are beautiful - stylish and most importantly comfort wise are really light. The aftercare has also been impressive - I highly recommend Firmoo. Thanks Firmoo and thank you Kate!
Ngozi
London, UK
